name: Idiopathic Left Ventricular Apical Aneurysm with Ventricular Tachycardia
chief_complaint: I keep getting these sudden racing heart episodes and sometimes feel like passing out

lab_results.ECG: sinus rhythm with frequent nonsustained VT

prognosis: Guarded due to risk of sudden cardiac death; requires close monitoring and possible device therapy
description: A rare form of localized ventricular dysfunction characterized by an isolated apical aneurysm without coronary artery disease. The condition predisposes to ventricular arrhythmias due to abnormal electrical pathways around the aneurysmal tissue.
